channel.title: Reliable cron job service - FastCron
channel.description: You can create and manage cronjobs for multiple websites, with your team. Know when your cron jobs are executed, get failure notifications via email, Slack, and webhooks.

item.title: Notify when cronjob succeeds after failed
item.description: Send email/Slack notifications when your cronjob succeeds after it failed before.

item.title: Max instances / overlapping executions
item.description: You can allow from zero to 5 overlapping executions by adjusting the Max instances.

item.title: Account settings
item.description: I've added a new tab to change the default cronjob settings.

item.title: One-time cronjob time settings
item.description: If you're setting cronjobs to run once at a specific time, please ensure that it's at least 15 seconds into the future.

item.title: Time filter
item.description: Filter scheduled executions to match both the day of the week and the day of the month

item.title: Cron notifications to owner AND member
item.description: FastCron can now send cron notifications to both the account owner and other team members.

item.title: Viewer / Read-only team member
item.description: You can now invite/add a team member with a Viewer role.

item.title: Run another cronjob after execution
item.description: You can now run another cronjob after a cronjob successful execution.

item.title: SetCronJob is now FastCron
item.description: New name, new logo, same old reliable cronjob service!

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: This is the beginning of the most reliable cronjob service
